subject: New York City Marathon
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: The New York City Marathon had taken place every year since 1970, but as the city recovers from Hurricane Sandy, many felt that it had become a source of dissension, rather than a galvanizing force.
snippet: The New York City Marathon had taken place every year since 1970, but as the city recovers from Hurricane Sandy, many felt that it had become a source of dissension, rather than a galvanizing force.
